2 
3 # Gravity Compensation Controller Tutorial
4 
5 This package shows the capabilities of the robot approaching to the table, grasping and placing an object by using WBC.
6 Moreover is also a tutorial on how to use smach_c, whole body control and how to generate steps to move the robot.
7 
8 In this package the user could learn how to:
9 
10 - Create a single smach_c state.
11 - Create an action smach_c state.
12 - Generate a smach_c state machine by concatenating several smach_c states.
13 - Generate an action server state machine.
14 - Create a smach_c concurrence for parallel states/state_machines
15 - Use boost optional to pass parameters by constructor or by user_data (during exeution time).
16 - Change controller actions walking <-> WBC.
17 - Generate and execute a set of steps for the robot.
18 - Learn the usage of the basic smach_c states (move_tip, aruco_detection, gaze_task, get_outcomes, wait_for_aruco_detection, play_motion).
